caption: Authorization
description: Authorization events report privileges or groups assigned to a user, user session or group.
name: authorization

actor.description: The actor that performed the authorization grant or revocation.

principal.description: The entity to which permissions were granted.

grants.description: The permissions or privileges that were assigned to or revoked from a principal.

dst_endpoint.description: The Endpoint for which the authorization was targeted.

resource.description: The resource that was the target of the authorization change.
